properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT LOCATION_CODE, LOCATION_NAME FROM LOCATION
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO,BOARD_WRITER,LOCATION_CODE,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO BOARD_ATTACHMENT(BOARD_FILE_NO ,BOARD_REF_BNO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL,SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL,?,?,?)
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, LOCATION_NAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,USER_ID,CREATE_DATE,COUNT,GOOD,BAD FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN LOCATION L ON (B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_FILE_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM BOARD_ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.USER_ID LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD_REPLY(BOARD_REPLY_BNO, BOARD_REF_BNO, BOARD_REPLY_WRITER, BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_BRNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)

SELECT BOARD_REPLY_BNO, USER_ID, BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(R.CREATE_DATE,'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS')AS CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD_REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.BOARD_REPLY_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE R.BOARD_REF_BNO = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD_REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
DELETE BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
DELETE BOARD_Attachment WHERE BOARD_REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET LOCATION_CODE = ? ,BOARD_TITLE =? ,BOARD_CONTENT =? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO =? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE BOARD_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
INSERT INTO BOARD_ATTACHMENT(BOARD_FILE_NO,BOARD_REF_BNO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH) VALUES(SEQ_BANO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE BOARD_REPLY SET BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET GOOD = GOOD+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET GOOD = GOOD-1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET BAD = BAD+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET BAD = BAD-1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO BOARD_LIKE VALUES(SEQ_BLNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,1)
INSERT INTO BOARD_UNLIKE VALUES(SEQ_BULNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,1)
SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM BOARD_UNLIKE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD_UNLIKE WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM BOARD_UNLIKE WHERE USER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND L.LOCATION_CODE = 'S3' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND L.LOCATION_CODE = 'S2' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND L.LOCATION_CODE = 'S7' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND L.LOCATION_CODE = 'S1' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND L.LOCATION_CODE = 'S5' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,LOCATION_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID,COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN LOCATION L ON(B.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND L.LOCATION_CODE = 'S6' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
